lead_paragraph: The Mexican government said Monday that drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman is pursuing a campaign to try to loosen the security measures at the maximum-security prison where he has already escaped once.

headline.main: Mexico Sees Attempt to Loosen Security on 'El Chapo'
headline.print_headline: Mexico Sees Attempt to Loosen Security on 'El Chapo'

snippet: The Mexican government said Monday that drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman is pursuing a campaign to try to loosen the security measures at the maximum-security prison where he has already escaped once.
